Package net.mtrop.doom.map.data

Class DoomThing

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.mtrop.doom.map.data.DoomThing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryObject
    public class DoomThing
extends Object
implements BinaryObject
    Doom/Boom/MBF 10-byte format implementation of Thing.
    Author:
    Matthew Tropiano
